  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DateJSONAdapter
    This class is a custom Moshi handler that can serialize and deserialize Date objects
    ElegantAutoLabelingCustomPolymorphicJsonAdapter
    This class is a custom JsonAdapter that allows to serialize and deserialize polymorphic objects It automatically adds a label to the serialized object to identify the subclass The label is the first field of the serialized object
    ElegantAutoLabelingCustomPolymorphicJsonAdapterFactory<T>
    This class is a custom JsonAdapter.Factory that allows to serialize and deserialize polymorphic objects It should be registered with a Moshi instance to allow it to serialize and deserialize polymorphic objects
    GameDataJsonParser<T>
    This class is a custom Moshi handler that can serialize and deserialize any game object
    GameFieldPositionCardMapAdapter
    This class is a custom Moshi handler that can serialize and deserialize the map of GameFieldPosition and Side
    NetworkJsonSerializer
    This class is a custom Moshi handler that can serialize and deserialize any network packet.
    UUIDJsonAdapter
    This class is a custom Moshi handler that can serialize and deserialize UUID objects
